value.title: Turn off Automatic Detection of Data Type in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Welcome to Power BI Tip. Today's Tip is - How we can Turn off Automatic Detection of Power BI Datatypes.  Please go through video for detail information. #PowerBI #PowerBIDesktop #PowerBITip

value.title: Upgrade Classic workspace to the new Workspaces in Power BI
value.excerpt: Upgrade Classic workspace to the new Workspaces in Power BI In this video, we will learn, how we can upgrade our old classic workspaces to the new Workspaces in Power BI. value.title: Use SharePoint Online List as A Data Source In Power BI
value.excerpt: In this vlog, we will learn how we can use SharePoint Online List as a Data Source in Power BI. Power BI provides various online services to consume data from different data source.
